title: adidas: BOOST - A Revolution in Running (subtitles available
description:
BOOST provides more energy return than any other foam cushioning material in the running industry. It combines soft comfort with responsive energy for the ultimate running experience. BOOST your run.

Find out more: http://www.adidas.com/boost
